This is my first notebook project in R. I will be exploring the following mocking soil laboratory dataset.
```{r include=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(knitr)

STL_2018_2022 <- read_csv("~/Downloads/STL_2018-2022.csv", 
                          col_types = cols(LabNo = col_character(),Type = col_character(), 
                                           NO3W = col_double(), B = col_double()))

```



```{r echo=TRUE}
by_years <- STL_2018_2022 %>% 
  group_by (Year) %>% 
  filter (Year<2023, 2017<Year)
by_years
```
